dia.en: It's a door.
No. The guard is out there.
It's a door.
It's a door.
It's an operating table. Looks very clean.
Why are their straps on it? Don't they use anesthetic here?
I don't think that will fool the guard.
It's an operating table. Looks very clean.
Why are there straps on it? Don't they use anaesthetic here?
There is no one to operate on.
That is securely locked.
That is securely locked.
Why would you want anything in there?
That unlocked it.
I don't think the guard would like that.
It doesn't fit the lock
It's full of medical supplies.
There is some hayfever pills in here. I'll just take them.
Isn't that stealling?
No....I work here as a doctor.
Why are there hayfever tablets in a cyborg operating theater?
Maybe I have hayfever and I put them there to keep them safe?
Hmm, I still think it's a bit convenient.
That is open.
The guard isn't going to let me do that.
It's full of medical supplies.
Locked away, so only Doctors can get to them.
Nothing else I want in here.
I'd like to keep my stealing from work to a minimum.
Oh, so you do admit it was stealing?
It's a small tank of O2. Otherwise known as oxygen.
That looks really heavy. I'm glad you aren't carrying it. It would really tire you out.
It's tank of oxygen, always handy!
What makes you think that?
I just have a feeling.
How did you fit that in your pocket?
It's not as big as it appeared.
Is that a TARDIS in your pants or are you just happy to see me?
It's a small tank of O2. Otherwise known as oxygen.
It's tank of oxygen, always handy!
It's one of those eye charts opticians use.
Is that what it said last time? I think you need your eyes checking.
I don't want it.
It's a light. Nice and powerfull, so the surgeon can see what he is doing.
I like the light being on.
Scared of the dark?
No
At least I don't think so.
It's the guard I asked to come in here.
Hi
Hi
I'm not using people!
It's the guard I asked to come in here.
Hi
Hi
I'm not using people!
I work here.
That's just what a trespasser would say! If you really work here, what is it that you do?

title.en: I'm lost and looking for the way out.

dia.en: I'm lost and looking for the way out.
What do you mean, lost? Are you trying to tell me that you got lost here while you were sneaking around? Now, really, what are you doing here?

title.en: You murdered my family and I'm on a quest for vengeance.

dia.en: You murdered my family and I'm on a quest for vengeance.
Do you really expect me to believe that?
Well I was kinda hoping...
You know damn well that you're on the top floor of the Future Tech building. Now tell me what you're doing here.

title.en: Of course not! I was just joking around.

dia.en: Of course not! I was just joking around.
Ha ha, very funny... Now tell me what you're doing here.

title.en: Ok, you got me, I lost my keycard, and Sarah lent me one of her old ones.

dia.en: Ok, you got me, I lost my keycard, and Sarah lent me one of her old ones.
Well, that may be the case, but with out a correct ID, I can't let you stay. Come with me please.
I found it.
I've had enough of you. Get out!

title.en: Yes, don't you know who I am? I'm the CEO around here.

dia.en: Yes, don't you know who I am? I'm the CEO around here.
Enough of this, follow me.
Brian Dennehy.
Who?
Jonathan Coulton.
You think breaking the forth wall will help?
Sarah Bio
According to your ID, that would be you.
I know a guy.
What a coincidence! I know a guy too! And he likes throwing people out of places they shouldn't be. Why don't you tell me who your guy is before I introduce you to him?

title.en: Is the fact that I could have you lose your job good enough?

dia.en: Is the fact that I could have you lose your job good enough?
Well... uh... Who's the person you'll need to talk to to have that happen?

title.en: Look, that patient might lose his life!

dia.en: Look, that patient might lose his life!
Look, I understand that, and I hope you understand that I'm just doing my job. Now, why do you have someone else's keycard?

title.en: Don't make me force you to leave.

dia.en: Don't make me force you to leave.
Do you think I'm afraid of you?

title.en: What? Nope, that's uh, that's mine. Totally.

dia.en: What? Nope, that's uh, that's mine. Totally.
Nope, that's not yours. Totally.
I did get a haircut..
There's more wrong here than just hair Ms Bio...

title.en: Look, I have to hurry to prepare the operating room. We just got another late patient in.

dia.en: Look, I have to hurry to prepare the operating room. We just got another late patient in.
I still need to have proof you're a surgeon.

title.en: My keycard? Err… I think I left it in my other pants.

dia.en: My keycard? Err… I think I left it in my other pants.
Heh, Nice try.
Do you mean this keycard?
Hmm... I'm not convinced this is your card.

title.en: Keycard? Keycard? I don't need no stinkin' keycard!

dia.en: Keycard? Keycard? I don't need no stinkin' keycard!
Yes, you do.
I'm a mad scientist!
Mad, I'll buy. Scientist? In an Operating Theatre? I don't think so.
I'm a surgeon!
Surgeons aren't supposed to be here this late. If you just show me your keycard, I'll escort you to the foyer.
I'm a fashion designer!
With those shoes? Please. You'll have to tell me a more convincing lie than that.

title.en: This may seem like a stupid question, but where am I?

dia.en: This may seem like a stupid question, but where am I?
You don't seriously expect me to believe that you unwittingly opened a locked door and just stumbled in here by accident, do you?
I work here.
Oh really? What is it that you do?
I'll go wherever I please!

Sure. Just show me your security keycard and you can be on your way. Of course I'll also need authorised night shift documents signed by your superiors to allow you to be working this late. But you all ready know that. Didn't you?

title.en: Where do you think YOU'RE going?!

dia.en: Where do you think YOU'RE going?!
With you. To the police station. Without a security keycard the only way you're leaving this building is in cuffs.
Er... Hi
What do you think you're doing here?

title.en: I've lost my memory, just woke up in a locked room and I have no idea where I am.

dia.en: I've lost my memory, just woke up in a locked room and I have no idea where I am.
Must of been one hell of a party. Now what are you doing in here?

title.en: Gah! Look behind you! A three-headed monkey!

dia.en: Gah! Look behind you! A three-headed monkey!
I'll have you know there hasn't been a mutant monkey escape for over three months! Now what are you doing here this late?

title.en: Can I just quickly get something out while you have it open?

dia.en: Can I just quickly get something out while you have it open?
No sorry, I'd lose my job if I let you.

title.en: Can I just borrow your key for the cabinet, I've misplaced mine?

dia.en: Can I just borrow your key for the cabinet, I've misplaced mine?
You've misplaced your key?
Please tell me you are joking, I'll have to change all the locks, get new keys cut, reassign all the keys, do a full inventory! Do you know how much work that would be?
I suggest you find your key, and quick, or you'll put me in a bad mood. And you wouldn't like me when I'm angry.
Why? Do you turn green and start breaking things?
Huh?
Never mind.
It's ok, I just remembered where I put it.

title.en: Can I just borrow your key for the cabinet, I've misplaced mine?

dia.en: Can I just borrow your key for the cabinet, I've misplaced mine?
I appear to have misplaced mine too.
I'll have to change all the locks, get new keys cut, reassign all the keys, do a full inventory!
Unless I can find it soon.

title.en: Should you not be getting back to your office?

dia.en: Should you not be getting back to your office?
Not unless something more important comes up.
Like what?
Something like an attempted break in. Both me the the other guard would need to study the security cameras closely.
Bye
Enough help
Hint
You better look like you are meant to be here
Bigger hint
The must be something around or in your inventory you can use
Tell me what to do!
Use the scrubs in your inventory to make yourself look like a surgeon

title.en: Enough help with the locked cabinet

dia.en: Enough help with the locked cabinet
Hint
Maybe someone has a key for this securely locked cabinet
Bigger hint
The guard has a key

title.en: How do I get anything while the guard is there

dia.en: How do I get anything while the guard is there
You can't, he needs to be out of the room

title.en: But the guard locks it when he leaves

dia.en: But the guard locks it when he leaves
You need to get his key somehow

title.en: How do I get the key?

dia.en: How do I get the key?
You need to make him forget it.
Although he always remebers to take it with him in here, so try another room
Don't tell me what

title.en: No, I can't find it. Just tell me!

dia.en: No, I can't find it. Just tell me!
The gas tank by the cabinet
No More Help Please

title.en: Help, I am trapped in the room

dia.en: Help, I am trapped in the room
I think the guard is about to enter, you better do something

title.en: How do I open the locked cabinet?

dia.en: How do I open the locked cabinet?
You need a key

title.en: Can I pick anything else up in here?

dia.en: Can I pick anything else up in here?
Yes
